doc.title: Fatihin fedaisi Kara Murat

credit.role: Mehmed II, Sultan of Ottoman Empire

doc.plot: Fatih Sultan Mehmet conquers Byzantine territory, making Istanbul capital of the Ottoman Empire. The cruel Vlad plunders Turkish villages, so Fatih orders Hamza Pasa to take care of him. Vlad captures the raiders and takes them as captives. Kara Murat whose brother is being kept as Vlad's captive, is sent as a spy to the Sultan. Kara Murat tells Fatih all what has happened and Fatih sends his soldiers to Vlad, yet Vlad escapes to Hungary. Kara Murat wants to take the revenge of his brother who has been brutally killed and is sent to Bucarest. He gets close to Vlad and introduces himself as Cafer the raider, who is ready to betray the Ottoman Empire. After some time, Vlad finds out his real identity and wants him to get killed. Murat escapes, he meets Angela, a warrior girl and they fall in love. In the end, Kara Murat kills Vlad and returns to Istanbul with Angela.
